pageSetting.title: 客户星级查询

attribute.value: SELECT FA.PDBH AS KEY, FA.PDMC AS VALUE FROM KHXJ_PDFA FA WHERE FA.PDNF=cast(SUBSTR('$tjrq$',1,4) as integer) order by FA.PDBH
select distinct max(xj.xjbh) as key, xj.xjmc as value from khxj_pdxj xj where xj.pdbh=$pdfabh$ group by xj.xjmc order by key

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ SELECT pdjg.TJRQ AS TJRQ, JG.JGDH AS JGDH, jg.jgmc as jgmc, pdjg.KHH AS KHH, pdjg.KHMC AS KHMC, DMMS.DMMS AS KHLB, PDFA.PDMC AS PDFA, PDJG.XJMC AS XJMC, MX.XMMC AS XMMC, MX.XMZ AS XMZ, pdjg.PDBZMS AS PDBZ, pdfa.pdbh as pdbh, mx.xmbh as xmbh, pdjg.xjbh as xjbh FROM khxj_pdjg_$nf$ pdjg INNER JOIN KHDX_JG JG ON JG.KHDXDH = pdjg.JGKHDXDH INNER JOIN CSB_DMMS DMMS ON DMMS.DMMC='DJPDKHLB' AND DMMS.DMZ=pdjg.KHLB INNER JOIN KHXJ_PDFA PDFA ON PDFA.PDBH = pdjg.PDBH INNER JOIN $yearMouth$ MX ON MX.PDBH = pdjg.PDBH and mx.khh = pdjg.khh and mx.tjrq = PDJG.TJRQ where 1=1 and pdjg.tjrq= $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and pdjg.khh like '%$khh$%' and pdjg.khmc like '%$khmc$%' and pdfa.pdbh = $pdfabh$ and pdjg.xjbh = '$xjmc$' order by pdjg.xjbh,jg.jgdh,pdjg.XJMC

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( SELECT pdjg.TJRQ AS TJRQ, JG.JGDH AS JGDH, jg.jgmc as jgmc, pdjg.KHH AS KHH, pdjg.KHMC AS KHMC, DMMS.DMMS AS KHLB, PDFA.PDMC AS PDFA, PDJG.XJMC AS XJMC, MX.XMMC AS XMMC, MX.XMZ AS XMZ, pdjg.PDBZMS AS PDBZ, pdfa.pdbh as pdbh, mx.xmbh as xmbh, pdjg.xjbh as xjbh FROM khxj_pdjg_$nf$ pdjg INNER JOIN KHDX_JG JG ON JG.KHDXDH = pdjg.JGKHDXDH INNER JOIN CSB_DMMS DMMS ON DMMS.DMMC='DJPDKHLB' AND DMMS.DMZ=pdjg.KHLB INNER JOIN KHXJ_PDFA PDFA ON PDFA.PDBH = pdjg.PDBH INNER JOIN $yearMouth$ MX ON MX.PDBH = pdjg.PDBH and mx.khh = pdjg.khh and mx.tjrq = PDJG.TJRQ where 1=1 and pdjg.tjrq= $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) and pdjg.khh like '%$khh$%' and pdjg.khmc like '%$khmc$%' and pdfa.pdbh = $pdfabh$ and pdjg.xjbh = '$xjmc$' order by pdjg.xjbh,jg.jgdh,pdjg.XJMC ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ SELECT FA.PDBH AS KEY, FA.PDMC AS VALUE FROM KHXJ_PDFA FA WHERE FA.PDNF=cast(SUBSTR('$tjrq$',1,4) as integer) order by FA.PDBH
